duck.Name: Duck
duck.Text: There is in this park a capyracle. He can help you!

duck.Name: Duck
duck.Text: It's my pleasure to help you!

capyracle.Name: Rick
capyracle.Text: Good evening, sacred capyracle! I want to ask you something...

capyracle.Name: Capyracle
capyracle.Text: I aleady know what is your question.

capyracle.Name: Capyracle
capyracle.Text: You should go to your sister's cabin There you will find the murder weapon.

capyracle.Name: Capyracle
capyracle.Text: No problem! I see your future will be bright

capyracle.Name: Rick
capyracle.Text: Thank you so much, sacred Capyracle!
